title: Is it permissible to eat insects in Islam? - assim al hakeem
transcript: it's a ruling about eating insects because now here in Europe is being permitted that incest can be put in ingredients of food so want to know what's wrong about it insects is something that is Despicable and it is not something that natural people would enjoy eating and hence the vast majority of Scholars say that it is prohibited to eat roaches ants to eat such insects that are found even if they come and say it is full of protein and it's good for you because this is not something that people naturally would consume and hence the scholars say that this is not permissible with the exception of locust because Locust is permissible in Islam to consume it whether alive or dead it does not require any Islamic slaughtering and it comes in huge millions and you can fill sacks of it and it's beneficial it's healthy and it's Halal at the same time
